articles.author: Martina Schwikowski
articles.title: 30 years on, South Africa's dream of unity lies shattered - DW (English)
articles.description: Thirty years after the end of apartheid, South Africa is looking back on a democratic but deeply divided society. Political divisions have fueled a growing disappointment with Nelson Mandela's liberation party, the ANC.
articles.content:
As a newly democratic country, South Africa got off to a euphoric start with its first free elections in 1994.
People queued up for hours to cast their votes, full of hope, optimism and joy. That po… [+7722 chars]
